amendment.description: Amendment redirects $1 million in funding within the Departmental Administration account in order to address environmental concerns in both urban and rural settings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $1 million in funding within the Departmental Administration account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
